description: This file is a PHP web page source code that generates a 'Gateway > At a Glance' status dashboard for a network management system. It includes server-side logic to gather device statuses (battery level, internet connectivity, Wi-Fi, MoCA, VoIP, firewall) and front-end JavaScript for UI interactions, such as toggles for modes like bridge mode, and displays connected device summaries.

classes.name: StatusDashboard
classes.description: Main class representing the network status dashboard, aggregating device statuses and UI controls.

methods.name: getStatusData
methods.description: Fetches relevant device status data from device configuration parameters and session, used to populate the dashboard.

methods.name: renderWiFiConfiguration
methods.description: Generates HTML for Wi-Fi settings display based on current Wi-Fi configuration parameters.

methods.name: initializeUI
methods.description: Sets up JavaScript UI components such as mode toggles and event handlers.
